pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro sattho rājagahā paṭiyālokaṁ gantukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.10_0: Atha kho te kammiyā taṁ satthaṁ gahetvā acchinditvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.13_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu sāvatthiṁ gantvā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.14_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.15_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu jānaṁ theyyasatthena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.16_1: jānaṁ theyyasatthena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.19_1: jānaṁ theyyasatthena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.22.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṁ theyyasatthena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjeyya, antamaso gāmantarampi, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.1.6_0: sāmaṁ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassa ārocenti, so vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.1.8_0: corā katakammā vā honti akatakammā vā,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.1.8_1: rājānaṁ vā theyyaṁ gacchanti suṅkaṁ vā pariharanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.1.12_1: ajja vā hiyyo vā pare vā gacchāmā”ti saṁvidahati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.1.14_0: kukkuṭasampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.1.15_0: Agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.2.1_0: Theyyasatthe theyyasatthasaññī saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.2.2_0: Theyyasatthe vematiko saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.2.3_0: Theyyasatthe atheyyasatthasaññī saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.2.4_0: Bhikkhu saṁvidahati, manussā na saṁvidahanti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
